definitions.definition: The light given off by a glowing object.
The condition of being passionate or having warm feelings.
The brilliance or warmth of color in an environment or on a person (especially one's face).
examples: He had a bright red glow on his face.

main_definition: The light given off by a glowing object.
secondary_definitions: The condition of being passionate or having warm feelings.
The brilliance or warmth of color in an environment or on a person (especially one's face).
